document.full_text: before the minnesota twins' francisco liriano threw a no-hitter against them last week, the chicago white sox had not been no-hit since bret saberhagen stymied them on aug. 26, 1991.
document.title: no-hitter droughts
lines_and_colors: before the minnesota twins' francisco liriano threw a no-hitter against them last week, the chicago white sox had not been no-hit since bret saberhagen stymied them on aug. 26, 1991.
